instructions:
Mix together ground beef, onion, egg, rice and G Washington. Shape into 8 oblong balls and set aside. In
a greased 2 1/2 quart baking dish add and cut up the stewed tomatoes, stir in sugar and the jar of gravy.
Gently place meatballs on top of tomatoes. Bake uncovered at 375 F for the first hour. Then reduce the
temperature to 350 F, turn the meatballs as they brown, scrape sides of dish and bake for the final hour.
Serve with mashed
potatoes. 
*(Rev. 10/10/97)*
ingredients: 1 envelope G Washington Brown seasoning mix
name: Rice Balls
creator: Lauretta Coffman
